item.name: Change Cmd+R to Ctrl+R for reverse search in terminal
Change command key to control key in Remote Desktop.
item.appendix: + Send Windows key event when you pressed the command key alone.
item.autogen:
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::TAB, ModifierFlag::RDC_COMMAND, KeyCode::TAB, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::RDC_COMMAND,
KeyCode::VK_LOCK_OPTION_L_FORCE_ON,
Option::KEYTOKEY_BEFORE_KEYDOWN, KeyCode::VK_NEGATIVE_LOCK_CONTROL_L_FORCE_ON, KeyCode::VK_NEGATIVE_LOCK_CONTROL_R_FORCE_ON,
